feed.title: Tianyi Liu
feed.subtitle: A website that introduces you to my works, my thoughts, my friends and colleagues, and more.

entry.title: I Love Trying New Things
entry.content:
Now I am here, writing blogs using Markdown files. This following code chunk is just an example.

import numpy as np
x = np.arange(10).reshape(3, 3)
x.sum()

Here is a line of math:

$ E = mc^2. $

Here I am embedding a tweet from Dirk Eddelbuettel, creator of the R/C++ interface package Rcpp:

RcppArmadillo 0.12.6.4.0 on CRAN: Another Upstream Bugfixhttps://t.co/xpJgIPyERW#rstats #rcpp pic.twitter.com/TV2tJ7bNY0

— Dirk Eddelbuettel (@eddelbuettel) September 11, 2023
entry.summary: Now I am here, writing blogs using Markdown files. This following code chunk is just an example.
